Package me.mayhem.save

Class SaveData

java.lang.Object
me.mayhem.save.SaveData
public class SaveData
extends java.lang.Object
A Data Transfer Object used for storing the relevant data about a save, and it's file. Majority immutable to improve memory performance but the id must allow to change as for level completion

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static SaveData from​(java.io.File file)
    Loads and instance of this DTO from the given file
    Difficulty getDifficulty()
    Gets the difficulty of the game the user selected
    java.io.File getFile()
    Gets the file the level is stored in
    int getId()
    The id of the current level the player is playing
    java.lang.String getName()
    The name of the file and the player (without the .txt suffix)
    static SaveData of​(java.lang.String name, int id, Difficulty difficulty)
    Creates an instance of the DTO for a level that has yet to have a file created for it
    void setId​(int id)
    Updates the id of the current level

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • from

      public static SaveData from​(java.io.File file)
      Loads and instance of this DTO from the given file
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the data object that has been read

    • of

      public static SaveData of​(java.lang.String name, int id, Difficulty difficulty)
      Creates an instance of the DTO for a level that has yet to have a file created for it
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player and the file
      id - the id of the level
      difficulty - the difficulty of the level
      Returns:
      a new instance containing the game's save data
